response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and engineered to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence, efficiency, and innovation. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe its value far exceeds $800,000. For this extraordinary opportunity, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $1,200,000. We understand that such a significant investment requires careful consideration, and we are here to provide all the necessary information and support to help you make an informed decision. Should you choose to proceed, we assure you of unparalleled service and a seamless transaction. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
